title: Sharakarma
author: Sharakarma
content: SharakarmaWe help with exchanging your payment methods into any form of money worldwide!We welcome everyone. Sharakarma exchange service provides a variety of services for exchanging popular payment methods, as well as special services, so that your request will be fulfilled in the best possible way and in the shortest possible time.The main directions:* Exchange of e-wallets Skrill, Paxum, Wise and others for cryptocurrency and fiat funds;* International money transfers: ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡ºðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡ªðŸ‡µðŸ‡­ðŸ‡µðŸ‡¹ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡µðŸ‡±ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹* Withdrawal of your assets to e-wallet, bank card, cash and other ways;* Conversion of cryptocurrency into national money of any country and vice versa;* Money transfers via Swift, SEPA, SEPA Instant and others.We have been working since March 2022, during this time more than 20,000 successful transactions in various directions have been performed.Contacts:* Telegram: @sharakarma* Skype: live:.cid.5e07b3eb97fd64b6* E-mail: support@sharakarma.com* WhatsApp: +380668948238* Instagram: sharakaarma

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: Sharakarma on December 06, 2023, 01:46:17 PMWe have been working since March 2022, during this time more than 20,000 successful transactions in various directions have been performed.The domain was registered in October, how has it been working since March?20,000 successful transactions and we did not hear about you anywhere. I searched and did not find user opinions, whether positive or negative.Code:Expires On2024-10-04Registered On2022-10-04Updated On2023-09-18It is best to avoid making bank transfers with unknown services, as this may cause problems for the account holder and you will receive cryptocurrencies, which are easier to hide.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: 20,000 successful transactions for a service that just had its domain updated on 2023-09-18. I doubt if it was even online before the beginning of this year. What is even more surprising is that after all those 20,000 successful transactions, there is not a single review about your exchange. Not a negative one, not a positive one.Someone is definitely lying here.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: This is a new exchange with no review yet only a few sites are linked to them and all backlinks just created last November meaning the service itself just started recently and I believe they don't have any customers yet.The 20k transaction is just a marketing strategy to attract users to use their service but the fact is they don't have any single transaction yet.After digging and use some Google tools the site was published March 11, 2023, not 2022.So all the information he provided above is not true.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on December 07, 2023, 11:56:35 PMAfter digging and use some Google tools the site was published March 11, 2023, not 2022.So all the information he provided above is not true.I don't think he will come back again. He will try to promote the service in less strict forums and they do not care whether it is a scam or not, but it is difficult to believe that he will not create other accounts with other links.

comments.author: Sharakarma
comments.body: Quote from: Yamane_Keto on December 06, 2023, 04:03:57 PMQuote from: Sharakarma on December 06, 2023, 01:46:17 PMWe have been working since March 2022, during this time more than 20,000 successful transactions in various directions have been performed.The domain was registered in October, how has it been working since March?20,000 successful transactions and we did not hear about you anywhere. I searched and did not find user opinions, whether positive or negative.Code:Expires On2024-10-04Registered On2022-10-04Updated On2023-09-18It is best to avoid making bank transfers with unknown services, as this may cause problems for the account holder and you will receive cryptocurrencies, which are easier to hide.Hey buddy!I apologize if I didn't express myself correctly, but we have 20 thousand successful transactions on the famous cryptocurrency exchange Binance.Â And not only there, because we started our work here.If you think I'm not telling the truth, find us on binance ''sharakarma'' in payment method, skrill/wise/any uah, we're usually there, or text us in tg we'll give you a link to our profile. We're expanding, Therefore, we promote all our sites, including the website.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Sharakarma on December 14, 2023, 08:00:06 PMHey buddy!I apologize if I didn't express myself correctly, but we have 20 thousand successful transactions on the famous cryptocurrency exchange Binance.Â And not only there, because we started our work here.If you think I'm not telling the truth, find us on binance ''sharakarma'' in payment method, skrill/wise/any uah, we're usually there, or text us in tg we'll give you a link to our profile. We're expanding, Therefore, we promote all our sites, including the website.Let me get this straight.Assuming I want to sell my wise USD for Bitcoins through your platform, so you take up the order, use the Binance p2p exchange, carry out the trade and then send me the Bitcoins into my address for a commission?Is that howe your platform works?

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on December 14, 2023, 11:10:08 PMAssuming I want to sell my wise USD for Bitcoins through your platform, so you take up the order, use the Binance p2p exchange, carry out the trade and then send me the Bitcoins into my address for a commission?Is that howe your platform works?(Same thought)That's how I think it works they exchange your coins/money directly from Binance through API(I guess) and send to your wallet.@OP if you have a budget and want to gain trust why not start a campaign here on the forum and hire a campaign manager?You can also gain trust if you hire trusted forum members here to review your site you can ask a campaign manager to hire them.
